general_return_policy.condition: Item must be unused, in original packaging, with tags attached.
general_return_policy.process: Contact customer support to initiate a return.
general_return_policy.refund_type: Refund to original payment method or store credit.
general_return_policy.exceptions: Final sale items, perishable goods, and gift cards cannot be returned.

electronics_policy.condition: Must include all original accessories and packaging. Restocking fee may apply if opened.
electronics_policy.process: Contact support for RMA number before returning.
